item.description:
When was the last time you visited Vermont? Poor state doesn't get much company. Well, I say we visit the new restaurant there. Get out of our rut and visit KRUT..... The Runway Cafe. Right on the field and a 45 minute or so flight. Local papers are saying its been updated and new. Homemade breads, maple syrup, breakfast or lunch. "... The café’s breakfast menu includes eggs, pancakes, breakfast burritos, homemade baked goods, coffee and espresso. For lunch, look for homemade soups, salads and wraps. Bush touts her homemade bread made from King Arthur Flour. She’ll also be serving smoothies..." Whatever all that means.... Anyhow...http://navmonster.com... for details.

YOU DECIDE WHEN RSVP IF YOU WANT A BREAKFAST RUN OR LUNCH!

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Vermont and Vittles! Breakfast or lunch? You vote.
